summary: an oral recombinant lactobacillus casei vaccine was developed with a recombinant lactobacillus casei vaccine against PEDV infection. the vaccine targets the intestinal microfold (M) cells and dendritic cells for delivering the core neutralizing epitope of PEDV spike protein. the immunogenicity of the orally administered recombinant strains was evaluated. electronic supplementary material The online version of this article contains supplementary material. the protein structure and sequence of fused COE-Col-DCpep predicted by SWISS-MODEL.
